admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The Textbook Development Project will
            support the Government's textbook upgrading program and
            is composed of five components. The first component will
            assist the Government to update the content and improve the
            pedagogical effectiveness of the new primary and secondary
            textbooks. The second, third, and fourth components will
            assist key central agencies, 22 provinces, and 21 university
            presses, respectively, to expand typesetting and printing
            capacity to meet growing demand and improve the production
            quality of published textbooks. The fifth component will
            support an integrated training program to upgrade the
            publishing and printing skills of staff from the central
            agencies, and university and provincial education publishing
            houses being supported by the project.
